title: Using the REST APIs on Kong or Staging

cells.data:
1. GasMask: http://www.macupdate.com/app/mac/29949/gas-mask
  2. Configure Gasmask for Kong/Staging: http://confluence.vidmark.local/display/QA/Update+switchhosts+on+a+Mac+with+Gas+Mask
  3. Your production client credentials will not work — you need to get new credentials specific to Kong (QA) and/or Staging
  4. OAuth locations:
    • Kong: https://oauth.qa.brightcove.com/v3/
    • Staging: https://oauth.staging.brightcove.com/v3/
  6. You’ll need to get your access credentials via the API rather than the Studio UI — see BCL-Solutions/bcls-proxy/kongCURL.txt and BCL-Solutions/bcls-proxy/kongCURL.txt for sample call (Analytics API — adjust operations as needed)
  7. For all curl commands, you will need to add the -k flag to skip certificate checks (these servers don’t have currently valid certificates)
  8. Whatever API you’re calling will also have different base URLs for Kong and Staging — you’ll need to ask someone on the appropriate Dev team what it is — for the Analytics API (please add others when/if you find out what they are):
    • Kong: http://data.aws-qa.rnatest.brightcove.com/v1/
    • Staging: http://data.aws-staging.rnatest.brightcove.com/v1/
  10. Versions of API Tester for test environments:
    • Kong: BCL-developer-docs/en/video-cloud/oauth-api/assets/kong-api-tester.sh
    • Staging: BCL-developer-docs/en/video-cloud/oauth-api/assets/staging-api-tester.sh
